comments:
The wizard was not come up and got NPE in CDT.
Platform: WindowsXP Japanese, RHEL4 U4 ja_JP.UTF8 locale
Test scenario: CDT 4.0 Enablement Test Cases, 4. Convert a project to a C/C++ Make Project

Steps to recreate
1- create a simple project
2- import the given files
3- Select New > "Convert to a C/C++ Make Project" from the context menu of the project
